Description: Name of the column in the data file that uses this code.
Human-readable label corresponding to the code.
Longer description of what the code means.
IRI of the controlled vocabulary that defines valid values for this column. Can point to SKOS concept schemes
column8: or any other controlled vocabulary. Required when referencing large external vocabularies.

Description: IRI of the specific ontology term (SKOS concept or other) that code_value represents. Links the code to the DFO Salmon Ontology.
